comment._content: Very nice photo, reflecting of an era past-gone !

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Elizabeth Shippen Green Elliott (1871-1954), longtime illustrator for Harpers Magazine and many books, especially children's literature: www.bpib.com/illustrat/green.htm She married in 1911, so this may have been a photo taken in connection with that event.

comment.author: 7711591@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Historic Heroines, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
